Tunable.name: ENABLE_AUTOGENERATION_SAME_SEX_PREFERENCE_THRESHOLD
Tunable.display: Enable Autogeneration Same Sex Preference Threshold
Tunable.description: A value that, once crossed, indicates the player's allowance of same- sex relationships with townie auto-generation.

TunableList.name: ENABLED_AUTOGENERATION_SAME_SEX_PREFERENCE_WEIGHTS
TunableList.display: Enabled Autogeneration Same Sex Preference Weights
TunableList.description: An alternative weightings list for the weighted random choice of sexual preference after a romantic same-sex relationship has been kindled.

TunableTuple.description: A mapping between gender and the gender preference statistic for easy lookup.

TunableEnum.name: gender_preference
TunableEnum.description: The gender to index the gender preference to.

Tunable.name: FEMALE_CLOTHING_PREFERENCE_TRAIT
Tunable.description: The trait that signifies that this sim prefers to wear female clothing.

TunableList.name: GENDER_PREFERENCE
TunableList.description: A mapping between gender and the gender preference statistic for easy lookup.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The gender to index the gender preference to.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The statistic that represents the matching gender preference
